title: Winter World (Eclipse)
description:
'Winter World' by Chuck Dixon and Jorge Zaffino is the next contestant on the Eclipse! Comics! Upload! Project!

Winter World is a three-issue mini-series published by Eclipse in 1987-88. Per Dixon's own website, the premise is:

"The earth is entirely frozen over. It's hundreds of years in the future, and present day civilization is all but forgotten. Scully, the main character, is a trade rider. He travels from one little pocket of civilization to the next, trading goods that he finds in the shopping centers and malls under the ice."


Props to the creative team and the scanners! Get it, seed it!
